meanings.sent1: The colorful birdie chirped happily in the tree.
meanings.sent2: I saw a little birdie hopping around the garden.
meanings.sent3: The tiny birdie tried to sing opera but sounded like a squeaky toy.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as melodious as a birdie's song.
meanings.sent5: The birdie's feathers shimmered in the sunlight, a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A score of one stroke under par in golf
meanings.sent1: He celebrated getting a birdie on the golf course.
meanings.sent2: Scoring a birdie made him feel proud of his golf skills.
meanings.sent3: The birdie on the golf course decided to take up ballet instead.
meanings.sent4: Her accurate shot was like hitting a birdie every time.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered as he achieved a perfect birdie on the final hole.
